nodes.text: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Galactic Guide

Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Galactic Guide is a reference title for the film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker by DK Publishing. Written by Matt Jones, the book was released on December 20, 2019, the same day as the film itself, containing information on the film.

Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Official Guide is a 96-page informative guide to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker for younger fans, revealing the characters, creatures, droids, locations, and technology from the new film. Packed with images and information, it's the perfect companion for those who want to relive the movie outside of the theater..
The book incorrectly refers to Ajan Kloss as a planet, rather than a moon.
